lines.text: I just don't know how Leslie's gonna take it when I tell her Tommy's missing.
Don't tell her.
...That's one way to deal with it...
Just what are you trying to tell us, Sheriff?

[angrily]
That Janet is MISSING!... Along with all the other Children of Ravensback.
You don't think they've been kidnapped, do you?
I don't know what to think.

[in a stoned voice]
A kidnapping in Ravensback! Oh Jack, how exciting!
[giggles while smoking a joint]
This s a... a lovely piece, Mrs. Shore.
[holds up an ashtray full of weed with an appalled look]
Why Sheriff, I didn't know you were into art! Jack and I brought that piece back from Rome last year, didn't we, darling?

[dumps all the weed into the swimming pool in disgust]
... Call me if Janet shows up.
I'm sorry Billy... I didn't mean to hurt you...
It's alright, Cathy.
Harry the Hawk does it again!
I want you to take a couple of codeines and rest.
[Leslie stares at the bottle and ignores Joyce]
Joyce!
Tommy... a- a- AHHH!
What is that?
I dunno, looks like some kind of a... a pimp.
Yeah, but maybe there really was a pressure drop...
Yeah, and, uh, maybe they'll pay us overtime, eh? Look, those fatasses got no idea what's goin' on! Now if we go up there we're just gonna have to do this again, you wanna do this again?
Not on my time! Let's get a beer!
Apparently you're new here... I'm Sanford Butler-Jones!
Kiss me Harry! I'm goin' home Harry! Bye Harry!
Tell us the truth Harry, you get into that sweet lil' thing yet?
